translations: n.前甲板；船头的船楼；前甲板下面的水手舱

phrs.translation: 艏楼, 艏艛, 前甲板, 船首楼首楼
首楼甲板, 艏艛甲板, 艏楼甲板, 船首楼甲板首楼甲板
艏艛, 艏俒, 船首楼

短艏艛, 短首楼, 短艏楼

sentences.sentence: It was at this moment that Ed Teynte the quartermaster emerged from the forecastle and came along the deck.
sentences.translation: 就在这个时候，舵手埃德·廷特从船头的船楼出来，沿着甲板走来。

sentences.sentence: The forecastle deck will have small sheer for drainage.
sentences.translation: 艏楼甲板应该有小的舷弧用于排水。

sentences.sentence: "My vessel has only slight damage on forecastle and bulb," I intone.
sentences.translation: “我的船有前部水手舱和灯泡有轻微损毁，”我徐徐道来。
